description.value: Character can re-roll failed Awareness and Psyniscience tests to detect the presence of Daemons. Additionaly their attacks against Daemons gain the Proven (3) Quality.

system.benefit: Character can re-roll failed Awareness and Psyniscience tests to detect the presence of Daemons. Additionaly their attacks against Daemons gain the Proven (3) Quality.
